snippet: A clampdown on foreign ownership in the Indian state has pushed the wealthy residents of New Delhi and Mumbai into the buying lead.
lead_paragraph: A clampdown on foreign ownership in the Indian state has pushed the wealthy residents of New Delhi and Mumbai into the buying lead.

headline.main: Upscale Indians Dominate Vacation-Home Market in Goa
headline.print_headline: Upscale Indians Dominate the Vacation Home Market in Goa
